## geras.Drawer.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Drawer` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(block: BlockSvg, info: RenderInfo);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | [BlockSvg](./blockly.blocksvg.md) | The block to render. |
|  info | [RenderInfo](./blockly.geras.renderinfo.md) | An object containing all information needed to render this block. |
